column1:
thechabear,"2015-10-09T16:10:18.887Z","the mlg cyborg","

Hello everyone and welcome to my first dimensions review, today we are going to look at cyborg whom is really good in the game so lets get started
The box is like all of the other dimension boxes. Instructions only tell you how to build the figure :(.
The parts that stand out to me are
CYBORG: I love this figure. It was only available in the $70 javelin but now you can get it here. His printing is awesome and unique. He comes with his cool cyborg
column2: hair\helmet and he comes with a double sided face. He also comes with a pearl&nbsp

column1: The build was one of the simplest just looking at the box. I hate how we don'
column2: t have any instructions (till you play the game). But i actually did it right. Because I had to look at the box so many times it took me 12 minutes

column1: MINI CYBORG MECH: This mech is one of the tallest dimensions vehicles in the line right now. The arms do move on ball joints and the legs move on ball joints too. The translucent red glass is used for the cockpit. There is a pole that holds the mech
GAME PLAY: Cyborg is one of the best charters in the game. In his regular mode he can shoot lasers and melt those gold bricks. He can also turn into the huge cyborg from lego batman 3. So it'
column2: s just awesome. The mech can also melt stuff and punch.

column1: I think this is one of the better dimensions sets. It'
column2: s easy to build and the cyborg&nbsp
column3: minifig is just cool. In gameplay the mech&nbsp
column4: mode is beast and still in short mode it&#39
column5: s good Hope you enjoyed my first review of dimensions.

column1: ,TRUE,5,5,5,5,5 Odeinoichus","2018-10-18T20:05:56.4Z","First Teen Titan member on the Team","
column8: >Set #71210 DC Comics Fun Pack Cyborg:
column13: > Another addition from Series 1 of LEGO Dimensions which was granted new life in Series 2 thanks to the inclusion of Teen Titans Go. Considering this version was only available in a large expensive set, this Fun Pack was good for getting the Minifigure cheaply. Is it one you need if you&rsquo
column14: re only interested in completing the game 100%? Well we&rsquo

column8: >All Fun Packs feature the same packaging, I reviewed it in-depth in the Wonder Woman review. This variation includes Cyborg on the front and is pretty much uniform. Display all of the packages together and it looks great, or chuck it in the recycle bin and you won&rsquo
>Not too many fun parts here compared to Wonder Woman, however this set does include some of the MIXEL ball joints as part of the model.

>Cyborg: As I noted before this version of Cyborg was also seen in the LEGO DC Super Heroes set Darkseid Invasion. The printing is pretty much identical here, I enjoy the level of detail for the figure, and his toy tag looks great with all the printed detailing. He includes a stud launcher weapon for when you want to play with the figure off the toy pad.
>Cyber-Guard: This model was fun to build, it&rsquo
column9: s a mecha suit that can be rode in in-game, however the model itself doesn&rsquo
column10: t match the model 100%, it does a good enough job with the parts in the set though.

column8: >Cyber-Wrecker: Here we re-build the humanoid model into a four-legged mecha vehicle re-using the parts very nicely. Again the in-game model is not identical, there is definitely some cheating being done to make the physical model resemble the digital model considering how many pieces they have. Still it&rsquo
>Laser Robot Walker: This one is a real disappointment, comparing the physical model to the digital model and the parts used in place of what we got here, I&rsquo
column9: d say the digital build is a bit bulkier and better designed compared to the physical design. This is what we need to expect from 3-1 I suppose. The build is still a little bit fun, though I feel it could have been better.

Alternative Models: All three of these models lack something when compared to the digital models, the digital versions are much better looking and better designed. However the physical models are truly impressive considering the limitation they had to work with. The first two models, the Cyber-Guard and the Cyber-Wrecker are better to play with off the pad though, the third model is just a weak offering and looks horrible, it&rsquo
column10: s also lacking in decent poses when you want to make it look dynamic while sitting on the toy tag.

column8: >The Adventure World: With Series 1 Cyborg could only access the DC Comics world, however TT made some changes so now you should, in theory, be able to access the Teen Titans Go Adventure World as well. I never attempted to access that world with Cyborg alone on the pad, since I had Beast Boy, Raven and Starfire at the time, so I&rsquo
column9: m not sure if he can actually grant you access here, but in theory it&rsquo

Vehicle Abilities: Cyborg has the Dive ability, can destroy cracked LEGO objects, fire on targets, access a unique Big Transform, use Technology switches and has the Laser ability in Series 1. Series 2 added the transformation into Teen Titans Go Cyborg when he&rsquo
column10: s in the Teen Titans Go Adventure World.

column8: >The Cyber-Guard is a Mech Walker, it has no unique abilities aside from being a giant mech that all of your characters can ride around in. When you re-build it into the Cyber-Wrecker you can now Dig and destroy Cracked LEGO Objects. The third and final model gives you the ability to destroy Gold LEGO Objects, a very limited range of abilities.

>Cyborg is not unique in the slightest when you take only Series 1 into consideration, however the entire Teen Titans Go team can be accessed in the TTG Adventure World using LEGO Batman Movie Robin&rsquo
column10: s Toy Tag. This gives you access to some truly amusing dialogue conversations, so if you want to experience all of the funny dialogue moments of TTG World you&rsquo

column9: t care about having the entire team in the TTG World then it&rsquo
column10: s really safe to skip this one. Mildly Recommended for folks who want a complete collection or want to have all of the Teen Titans in-game. Safe to skip for people only looking to complete the game 100%.
